title: Friends with Benefits
description: Hal and Ty have been friends since college and they’ve had sex with each other since those late night cram sessions in the dorm room. During one of their sex bouts, Hal realizes he is in love with Ty but decides to keep his feelings secret for fear of being rejected. But then a business deal offers them the opportunity to fly to Paris—the city of lovers—and Hal decides he must reveal his feelings—and bring about his most erotic fantasy.
author: Stone Richards
